description:
35 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
125% Base Mana Regen

Soul Siphon
Gain 35% of pre-mitigation damage dealt to champions as Soul Charges. Healing or Shielding an ally consumes all Soul Charges to restore Health.
name: Echoes of Helia
plaintext: Damage low-health enemies to trigger a cursed explosion, dealing damage and slowing nearby foes
